name: SCHOLA LEARN 🚀
title: Live, online classes for curious kids ages 4 - 9 ❤️
subtitle: Have your child learn about interesting topics from awesome, engaging teachers. All you need is Zoom.

register.title: Sign-Up For a Class 😄
register.subtitle_topic: 🚀 Tap the topics your children would be interested in. Pick as many as you want!
register.subtitle_time: 📅 Tap on the days that would work best for you for an online class.

dashboard.title: Upcoming Live Classes 🔍
dashboard.subtitle: Hi there, asdsad. Hope you're having an awesome day. Go ahead and book some classes!
dashboard.promote_group: 👍 Want to join ZipSchool's Facebook Group where you can getbonus material, chat with teachers, and join smaller classes?
dashboard.promote_share: ❤️Do you have friends with kids? Click the button below to copy the link you can share with them to get them some free classes!

success.title: Success!
success.subtitle: Yay! You're all set. We sent an email to {{email}} with more info. See you on {{time}}
